jgame

Class GRootContainer

  • java.lang.Object
    • jgame.GRootContainer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GObjectHolder, GPaintable

    public class GRootContainer
extends java.lang.Object
implements GPaintable, GObjectHolder
    The root container for a game.
    Author:
    William Chargin

      • add

        public void add(GObject object)
        Adds the given view with the name as the same object. This method is discouraged.

        Equivalent to addView(object, object).

        Specified by:
        add in interface GObjectHolder
        Parameters:
        object - the view to be added
        See Also:
        GObjectHolder.add(jgame.GObject)

      • addView

        public void addView(java.lang.Object viewName,
                    GObject view)
             throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Adds the given view to the list of views under the given name. If a view of the same name already exists, it will be replaced.

        If the list of views is empty before calling this method, then the new view will be set as the current view. Otherwise, the current view will remain unchanged.

        Parameters:
        viewName - the view name
        view - the view
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if viewName or view is null

      • addViewAndSetCurrent

        public void addViewAndSetCurrent(java.lang.Object viewName,
                                 GObject view)
        Adds the given view under the given name, and sets it as the current view.

        This method is equivalent to invoking first addView(Object, GObject) and then setCurrentView(Object).

        Parameters:
        viewName - the view name
        view - the view

      • setCurrentView

        public void setCurrentView(java.lang.Object viewName)
                    throws java.util.NoSuchElementException
        Sets the current view to that with the given name.
        Parameters:
        viewName - the target view's name, as determined in the previous call to addView(Object, GObject)
        Throws:
